title: World-Wide
text:
The Justice Department's internal watchdog and Senate Democrats both vowed to investigate the Trump administration's secret seizure of communication records of people associated with the House Intelligence panel.

---

G-7 leaders returned to face-to-face diplomacy after a gap of more than a year as they focused on how to foster recovery from the pandemic and push back against authoritarian states.

---

The FDA is making millions of J&J Covid-19 vaccine doses available for export from a Baltimore factory that had been beset by contamination problems.

---

The Biden administration is returning over $2 billion in unused money for the southern border wall that had been shifted from the Pentagon by the Trump administration.

---

PG&E said it is likely to proactively cut power to customers in Northern California more frequently this fall in anticipation of extreme wildfire risk.
